name: Adventurecraft--a-biome-adventure-game.-html
body:
### Welcome to AdventureCraft.
This is the page of AdventureCraft.  Steps below are how to download, but you may also contribute on Github.  I hope you enjoy AdventureCraft, though it is Open Source we do have the MIT License.  AdventureCraft is **almost** a clone of MineCraft except it is in your browser and you have a different set up and way to control your character.  You can _not_ see in the game.  Sorry!
Our wiki is being worked on thank you for your support.

```
**DOWNLOAD**
1. Download the .zip file from our Github page.
2.Unzip the .zip file.
3. Run STARTADVENTURE.html in your local browser.
4.Enjoy!
Cheers!
```
Wiki:
[http://goo.gl/IpAbwm](http://goo.gl/IpAbwm)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
